title: Journalists threatened and news website hacked in the Maldives (IFJ - International Federation of Journalists) ...
text: ( Source : IFJ - International Federation of Journalists ) The International Federation of Journalists strongly criticizes the hacking of Maldivian news website, Addu Live , and the threats made against its journalists. The IFJ calls on the
